content: Update .env with fresh Gemini API keys and Coinbase CDP credentials
Build Coinbase Advanced connector with CDP JWT auth + WS L2 orderbook + REST IOC orders
Apply design system (dark + lime tokens) to frontend index.css and tailwind.config.js
Build UI Layout: top bar with status pills + left sidebar navigation + main content area
Implement Overview screen: KPI cards (Net PnL, Capture Rate, p95 Latency, Active Windows) with sparklines
Implement Opportunities screen: live table with filters + real-time WebSocket updates
Implement Trades screen: ledger table with realized PnL + CSV export
Wire WebSocket connection in UI to receive opportunities and trades from gateway
Test Gemini connector with real API keys (WS L2 connection + order placement)
Test Solana connector with Helius mainnet (pool state fetching)
Test end-to-end flow: Gemini + Solana → signal → execution → UI display
Add Coinbase Advanced to dual-venue arbitrage (Gemini vs Coinbase vs Solana)
